example.caption: find n-grams in a string
example.input: n-grams "it was the best of times it was the worst of times"
example.caption: encode a string with the ROT13 substitution cipher
example.input: ROT13 "A quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."
example.caption: render a string in leetspeak
example.input: L33T "Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs."
